resources.string: Check your connection and try again.
This subject will be available to take attendance later.
You present at class in time of this subject.
You present at class late more than 15 minutes from the start time of this subject.
You absent at class this subject.

TIME INSTRUCTION:
 A subject will be availabel to take attendance between 15 minutes before start time to the end time of it.
 Present status: between 15 minutes before to 15 minutes after start time. (E.g. Start time is 8.00 AM, so you need to present from 7.45 - 8.15 AM
 Late status : late more than 15 minutes after start time to the end time of the subject.
